name: phonebook-backend
description: Backend service to the phonebook application

scripts.build: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../phonebook-backend
scripts.publish: cp -r index.js package.json package-lock.json build ../../../fullstackopen-heroku && git add . && git commit -m "deploy phonebook" && git push heroku main

author: Skyler
